body:
On 2010-02-22 09:10:49 -0800, George Kramerich said:


> Can anybody tell me the simple way to import an ies file into radiance?


> Depends how fancy you want to get with it. ies2rad does a basic import, 
> but it takes some additional effort to combine the photometry with 
> luminaire geometry. I'm working on a program which (I hope) will 
> simplify the job, but it is not quite alpha yet.
